name: VBA_Multi-User-Authority
project_en: Multi User Authority by Excel VBA
description_zh: 當需要多人共同編輯時，不免俗的會看到別人檔案，所以本專案希望建立一EXCEL檔案，利用一權限表決定該用戶能擁有查閱那些工作部的權限。本項目是採用各幹部評定考績來當作範本。
description_en: When multiple people are required to edit together, it is inevitable to see other people's files, so this project hopes to create an EXCEL file, and use a permission table to determine which user has permission to access these worksheets. This project uses the performance appraisal of each cadre as a example.
